full_summary:
# Ingonish Beach Washroom Replacement, Cape Breton Highlands National Park

## Contract Title and Reference Information

- **Contract Title**: Ingonish Beach Washroom Replacement
- **Contract Reference**: **PW-22-01003726**
- **Amendment Number**: 11
- **Solicitation Number**: **5P468-22-0072/A**
- **Tender Closing Date and Time**: **2022-10-06 13:00:00**

## Contract Overview

Parks Canada is seeking to engage a contractor for the construction of a new washroom building and associated infrastructure at Ingonish Beach, Cape Breton Highlands National Park. The project is estimated to be valued between $500,001 and $1,000,000 including taxes.

## Project Requirements

- The contractor must supply and construct a new washroom building and associated infrastructure
- The project must be completed no later than **March 31, 2023**
- The contractor must provide necessary documentation and evidence for bonding and insurance requirements

## Tender Submission Requirements

- Bids may be submitted via email to **soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca**
- The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is **15 MB**
- Bids must be accompanied by all required documentation and evidence
- Late submissions will not be considered

## Site Visit and Enquiries

- A site visit is recommended to be held on **August 16, 2022** at 11:00 (local time) at the Beach parking lot, 90 Beach Road, Ingonish, NS
- Bidders must confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend to the Contracting Authority by **August 15, 2022**
- All enquiries regarding the tender must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority

## Legal and Regulatory Requirements

- The project must be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act
- Documents may be submitted in either English or French, and any discrepancies between the two should be reported to the Contracting Authority

## Tender Documents

A list of tender documents and attachments are available from the Government of Canada tendering service at **www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders**.

## Important Notes

- Bidders must ensure that their submissions include all required documentation and evidence
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
- Late submissions will not be considered
